website_summaries.verdict: Fights aging and dry skin with ginseng root extract, chamomile, and green tea.
pros: Hydrating lotion goes on smoothly and absorbs well
Works better than many of the expensive brands and even cc creams
cons: It's a very thin lotion, so not for those who prefer a thicker cream

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spend more than you have to. NYX Prinmers are all good.
customer_reviews.text: The NYX cosmetic line is a great way to build up your beauty kit and not go broke doing it. I e tried so many NYX products and for the most part, I’ve preferred them to their high end counterparts. I can’t remember the really expensive primer thT this is a dead on dupe for. This primer helps my really dry skin (side effect of winter, age, and Tretinoin ) to have a dewy look. Not oily or too shiny. I love the stuff. My foundation goes on more evenly and my pores diminish. They don’t disappear. It’s not magic. But close.
customer_reviews.author: VB10

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this just out of curiosity because people have good comments on NYX product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just out of curiosity because people have good comments on NYX product. I have no complaints with this primer. Actually I think it moisturizes my face quite well and my cc cream doesn't crease on my mature skin. I am using it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Icela

customer_reviews.title: Smells good & works great
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and this has made such a big difference! I just apply it before my foundation and it takes away that flakey look. Also it smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Best Yet (especially for the price!)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several primers and they all dried my skin (I have combination skin). This one glides on (it feels almost like water)! This product seems to fill pores & gives my makeup staying power. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: ray j.

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This primer leaves my skin very smooth and hydrated, which helps with my makeup application and keeps it looking fresher longer. However, if you’re used to silicone type primers you may not like this at first, and that’s how I felt too, but after using it for a couple of weeks I really it. My skin feels like it’s had a drink after applying this and my makeup looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: NYX Fandom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Love the smell. Love the texture. For years I had been buying expensive primers but honestly, this NYX does a far better job on my skin. Mixed with the NYX setting spray this really gets the job done. My makeup looks great and stays on for the entire work day and well into the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Shellybeenz

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing without a greasy feeling
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. Some other primers instantly makes the skin on my face look and feel very dry. This is moisturizing without a greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mezzanine Daze

customer_reviews.title: One of NYX's best products!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this used on youtube and decided to give it a try. Being a woman of mature years, this made my make-up spread more easily and stay that ways most of the day. I'm the winner with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Watery nothingness
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad this was only $5 because it's a total waste of money. I use the other/regular NYX primer and absolutely love it. So I thought I'd try this one since the winter weather dries out my skin. This was nothing like I expected. VERY watery and somewhat sticky while applying. Doesn't cover anything or make my skin look any different. It also has a slight scent that I personally don't care for. Very disappointed, but I'll still use this brand! Just not this "hydrating" one.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a candle to E.L.F. hydrating primer
customer_reviews.text: I normally use E.L.F. hydrating primer, but I couldn't find it anywhere and decided to try this. I'm sorry I did. It goes on sticky, makes foundation look blotchy and thick, and doesn't have the "glide" that E.L.F. does. This product also gunked up my foundation brush instantly. Maybe I'm spoiled, but this one doesn't hold a candle to the E.L.F. primer. Same price, BIG difference. I will never buy this primer again. Lesson learned. (P.S.-Try the E.L.F. primer if you haven't already!)
customer_reviews.author: Gargoyle Princess

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have super dry skin. I have tried ALOT of primers ( drugstore and high end) and this is my new go to! This primer is water based... which is a must for me. I used to think i liked silicone primers but they just cause my foundation to slide and leave my foundation sticking to my faces dry patches. This has not done that. It is lightweight and feels slightly tacky/ moisturizing when i put it on. It helps my foundation last all day. If you haven't tried it, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect NYX primer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a bunch of primers from NYX, and this has been the best for my dry skin. This helps my makeup hold on throughout the day without being greasy or dry! The only downside for me is the scent, but it’s not irritating enough to stop me from buying again. Would recommend this primer!
customer_reviews.author: Nobari

customer_reviews.title: It's works well under my foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it glides on smoothly, but I was disappointed by how little there is in a tube. I would like to see more in a tube and pay a little more. Next time I would buy 2 tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: The best primer to hydrate and reduce wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 60 and this primer feels weightless and my skin looks amazing. Reduces wrinkles immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry skin! Hydrates while allowing my skin to breathe
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite Primer! It is so hydrating and perfect for winter. All of the other primers I’ve tried so many primers in the past and they are all so thick and sticky. This one is nice and thin and goes on smoothly. I feel like my skin can breathe under it. The only thing is, because it’s so thin, I’m tempted to use a lot. Not a huge problem, but I think I’ll be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago and love it already. Best makeup primer I've ever used. Glides onto skin very well, moisturizes my normal/combo skin, and creates the perfect tackiness to apply makeup. I used this on my entire face since I need a moisturizing primer to put on before makeup. It seemed to help with the creasing I usually get when I apply makeup without a primer. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I was having issues with my foundation not sticking to my skin and I researched and researched and determined it was because I didn’t have enough moisture in my skin. So I bought this product because I like NYX products and the price is good. I feel this makes the most difference with full coverage foundation. I use it every day and haven’t had a problem with my foundation since... and I still use the same foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I have super dry skin and it makes it so my foundation is not flaky!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry skin because of my thyroid condition and this purchase was based on wonderful views on the internet. It's supposedly a dupe for a high price name brand so I figured I would try it out at this cheap price. It's light and never feel like you have anything on your face even after I put it on. It makes my makeup stay on longer and not get cakey or flake off. It's cheap too and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NYNONI

customer_reviews.title: Not as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and I was looking for a primer that would not make my skin feel dry. This one is not that one. In first use my skin felt scratchy and dry. Tried a few more times and always had the same effect. I did not change my moisturizers, foundation or setting powder. I always test one product at the time. This primer applies easily and stays on it very well but it's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anna D

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing Dewey All Day Glow
customer_reviews.text: This primer is really moisturizing and gives me a great Dewey glow while under my liquid foundation. It makes my makeup last all day and is perfect for my incredibly dry skin. The scent is pleasant and subtle. For the price this is a solid staple primer.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel like anything was on my face!
customer_reviews.text: This was a really disappointing face primer. It did not hydrate or help my dry skin in anyway. It made my makeup look horrible as well. This was not the primer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mini

customer_reviews.title: Janet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t quite moisturize as well as I’d hoped but for the mine totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: This makeup primer gives you a nice base for your makeup. It is great for filling in fine lines without being drying like some other primers. Feels great on your face, not greasy or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Amy s

customer_reviews.title: Excellent primer for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a primer that is not drying. I have tried many expensive brands. This by far exceeds them all. My face has a airbrushed look that stays all day. I do get oily around my nose and chin. It doesn’t make it extra oily. ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 44 and it makes a big difference under my eyes. Seems thick at first but seeps right in. I ordered some for my mother and my 17 year old daughter and they love it as much as I do. It only takes a tiny amount!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper alternative
customer_reviews.text: I like this primer but it took some time to get over the scent. Which smells pleasant but just more fragrant that I am used to . Probably not as good as the more expensive brands but good enough for the $50.00 savings.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E. Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Good primer for "old lady" skin....
customer_reviews.text: Tiny little bit goes a very long way well worth the money very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: i have super dry skin and cannot even use the most moisturizing foundation "undiluted". I use this nyx primer to mix in to my foundations to make them go on smoother. it's like a super light moisturizer and makes my foundation go on smoother. it's not one of those that make your foundation ball up or peel, it's just great and a good price. wish they would make a bigger tube like laura mercies does
customer_reviews.author: Yk195

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on or “prime” at all
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good and decent priced moisturizing primer. I paired this with my usual foundation and same style of everyday makeup (for my usual work and casual outings). It doesn’t seem to last at all despite good reviews. Within a couple hours at work, I can see blemishes and birthmarks i covered up that morning! I’ve never had this issue before and my makeup has been the same.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: So sticky. Did not glide on like I expected. Never dried smooth just stayed sticky. Did not make my skin look smooth or soft.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: As it should be.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it provided more moisture but maybe I just need to try a different product for my aging skin. Otherwise it makes my foundation and powder go on nicely and provides a good base.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: The scent smells good but I have really sensitive skin and when I put it on there i feel a really light burn but it’s not too bothering. I also don’t think it does any great thing for me , my makeup still turns out the same as before I used this. Maybe it’s my technique idk
customer_reviews.author: Letrece Kage

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was really nice. It smells good, rubs in well, and doesn't feel like it's clogging pores. I have acne prone skin and this hasn't triggered a breakout for me, unlike silicone primers. It honestly feels like moisturizer, but more runny and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Owens

customer_reviews.title: Favorite primer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite primer. It works just as well if not better than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: finally. something for my dry skin
customer_reviews.text: it's been nearly 12 hours since i slapped this and foundation on. face still looks and feels soft/great, not flaky for once. i love it even more than the oil primer. i'll stick w this one. super happy though the tube seems kinda small to me?
customer_reviews.author: little wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what the hype is about
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed was I felt like I literally had goopy water on me using this...it was odd. No smell. Runny consistency but I will say did moisturize well. It didn’t break me out (I have sensitive skin). Did notice skin was extra greasy after a few hours of it on. No I wouldn’t recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany757

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say this product is any better than one you could buy at Walmart or a local drug store. It gives the same result in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

customer_reviews.title: Caused breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: This product caused my face to break out majorly. I'm thirty years old, but the face looked like I was in my teenage years after using this product for three days.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this bettet price then in the stores
customer_reviews.author: RENATA FAVATO

customer_reviews.title: Great item to add to your primer collection
customer_reviews.text: Love it...very hydrating, absorbs without a heavy sticky feeling...love it...and good smell.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Not for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: Thos product is okay but not for mature skin. After a few hours it sets in wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: I’m 5o and love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I will buy again. I’m 59. Helps with fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Malone

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The best primer I have tried so far. Makeup goes on do smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Feels soo soft! Love feel and smells good but not perfume. Great if no makeup on
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This one and angel veil from NYX are my faves!!!
customer_reviews.author: GabyF

customer_reviews.title: Don't like too well doesnt do much of anything for me
customer_reviews.text: Don't like too well doesnt do much of anything for me
customer_reviews.author: Anglsluv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This works really well - it's not greasy or oily. I definitely plan to keep on buying and using it
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Stay hydrated all day
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day and it is wonderful. My skin stays hydrated all day. I have sensitive skin and this product does not irritate it at all. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst primer yet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the good reviews. This is very watery and does not make ANY difference. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Parra

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing primer
customer_reviews.text: Loving this primer. I have dry skin and this primer really helps. Thanks to Hot&Flashy for recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable how this product make my skin glow! This product is worth every dollar I spent and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Advent

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: Keeps makeup on entire day at work. Makes skin nice and soft too!
customer_reviews.author: Molly E

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I have nothing on
customer_reviews.text: It helps my concealer and eye make-up glide on. For someone that did not believe in a primer, I now see this has a natural part of my beauty routine
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this primer!!! Made my face matte and the makeup went on so smoothly and made it look professionally done! It is a total must have!
customer_reviews.author: Brad & Kelly Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and leaves my face very hydrated but not oily, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is lovely! At first you think it’s oiley but it’s not! Little goes a long way and the product will last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: I have been hunting for a water based primer so my make up doesnt just sit on my face. First time I tried it out, it did not disappoint and the price! I've paid so much for brand names and here is this beauty putting them all to shame.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very hydrating and a little pore filling. Didnt break me out.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt dry out skin like some other primers
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and makeup does seem to last longer. Not drying either!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A.

customer_reviews.title: base primer for skin care
customer_reviews.text: it leave your skin feeling soft, you only need A very small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Jamiecina

customer_reviews.title: Do you want to look 90 years old? 😣
customer_reviews.text: Creates *more* lines in the eye area making my face look like a 90-year old. Also, irritates the skin causing redness and flakiness.
customer_reviews.author: Isis is a goddess.

customer_reviews.title: As described but thin
customer_reviews.text: As described. Not as thick as I’m used to for s primer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like this served as much of a primer. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price! Works just like a high end product
customer_reviews.author: Michae Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Does not moisturize.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a water-like consistency and disappears quickly after you put it on. Does not make your skin feel moisturized at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It feels great on the skin. Very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: YuliyaG

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer! My skin is super weird and dry lately and this goes on so smoothly and makes my face feel soft and nice! A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I do love the product but more as a moisturizer then an primer
customer_reviews.author: Olga Zhuchenko

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I read great reviews so i thought id give it a try. Made me extremely oily
customer_reviews.author: SHANNA ASHBERRY

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer. Have been using it for long time now.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Nothing spectacular but does its job
customer_reviews.text: I've never used Primer in my life nd honestly the difference is not very noticeable. But for the price I paid, it's satisfactory
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent & a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it before I apply make up
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Works well under makeup especially if ur skin is on the dry side.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Good product for people with normal to dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this primer for a while. It smells good and it leaves a nice satin finish. Skin and makeup looks healthy and gooey but not greasy. However, my skin has changed these last 5 months. I’m struggling with acne. I’ve been changing my routine and products. I’m now using non comedogenic and oil free products that don’t clog pores. I purchased the L’Oréal infallible matte lock primer and I’m happy with it because it works well with my skin and also has a nice finish. This product is great for people with normal to dry skin I really enjoyed it and was in love with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s so hydrating and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I have super dry skin on accutane right now and this has been a godsend for putting on my makeup, it’s so refreshing. I use it with Urban decay priming spray and it’s so hydrating and it feels great under my makeup all day.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and texture of this primer. It goes on very silky. I have dry skin and my make up actually stays on longer and skin looks slightly dewy. I can actually say that I prefer this over the higher end brands that I have used. I could do with the initial smell though.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly nice. I didn't expect much from a cheap primer but it does feel somewhat moisturizing and provides a little "slip" to the skin in preparation for foundation. I personally use Estee Lauder Double Wear and I don't notice any pilling and it helps my foundation go on smoother and more evenly. I only wish the bottle was a little bigger but for the price I really can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Primer?
customer_reviews.text: I have super dry sensitive skin so a hydrating primer is a MUST after face wash and moisturizer but this makes it feel like I'm sweating when I know I'm not. Makeup stays in place but it FEELS like it's all just coming off. Honestly, it does this in less than 2 hours of me putting makeup on. I feel like one huge sweat ball. AND its winter, it's been pretty cold here in TN. I normally use the NYX Professional Studio Perfect Primer green version that I get from my local Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin Horne

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This Moisturizing primer did not moisturize, in fact it left my skin extremely dry, which made any creases I have look more defined and it did not help with putting my makeup on smoothly, it made my makeup pasty almost. I had to clean my face and start fresh without it. I'm not saying it's not going to work for other people's skin types, I'm just saying for my specific skin type which is borderline dry this didn't do anything good for it and it surely didn't moisturize. I sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Worked with my water-based foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I got another NYX primer on Amazon and it didn’t mix well with my water-based foundation (it made it clump up immediately). It took some research to find this primer that works with water-based foundations. I’m super glad I did - this makes my skin so smooth feeling and my foundation applies over it really nicely. I haven’t had any issues with this product on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: ChaseK

customer_reviews.title: My everyday must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very first step in my make-up routine - whether I am going high glam or just applying a quick, neutral look on a gloomy Monday morning. I apply this on fresh, clean skin and it so lightweight, doesn't feel heavy or sticky yet my skin certainly feels moisturized. It provides a magical canvas for every cosmetic I apply after (base, highlighter, contour, eye-shadow, brow pomade) doesn't streak on top of the primer, in fact, I'd argue that it performs its best because of the primer.
customer_reviews.author: Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on Dry Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t leave reviews a lot but I felt I had to on this. I have dry skin, eczema patches on my forehead and nose. I’ve used it for 2 days and this stuff is amazing. My skin feels so soft, and while the redness of the dry skin hasn’t gone away, it’s not flaky and nasty like usual, and easily concealable. This product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Approve!
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time yesterday. No irritation. I really like the subtle clean smell. Applies very nice. Almost reminds me of a less chalky version of skintune blur. It’s definitely moisturizing. My makeup looked flawless all day (even after a nap). My roommate is a makeup artist and complimented my makeup when I used this primer. I would say I approve.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom and she keeps telling me how much she absolutely loves it. It makes her face very soft and extends the wear of the rest of her makeup. It even works as an eyeshadow primer. She said that there is a slight fragrance but it is very pleasant and not offensive whatsoever. For the price and performance, I think it is an excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Snow

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a light moisturizer it's okay product
customer_reviews.text: This is more moisturizing than I expected but unfortunately I was not looking for a lotion. I was looking for a product similar to Mary Kay's primer that actually prepares your face for foundation. I was looking for a product that would help fulfill the gaps and imperfections in the skin before putting on foundation. This product does okay but definitely not as good as Mary Kay's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best primer ever.
customer_reviews.text: This was product reviewed by someone else and I decided to try it. LOVE THIS. It's very moist, but not greasy. Also doesn't glide off like some of those primers do, but it still keeps foundation from pooling in pores. I love it. Will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne K.

customer_reviews.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL Hydra Touch Primer - Go to primer for hydration
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorites!! I've been using this Hydrating face primer for quite some time now (years) and typically switch between this one the 'Green" Photo finish ready (anti-redness) primer by NYX, from time-to-time when breakouts & redness occurs. The Hydra face primer is very lightweight, non-sticky and has a mild and refreshing scent. I lightly pat a little extra below and on my eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Nicole Delgado

customer_reviews.title: My Skin Looked FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this recommended on YouTube and decided to give it a try. Best purchase I've made in years! Takes a little longer to set / dry . . . but the results are worth the wait. If that weren't enough, after a couple of weeks of daily use, my skin looked FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: donna muldowney

customer_reviews.title: Great Prince Point
customer_reviews.text: Ordered after watching a Youtube review. Works very well for the very inexpensive price point. I have a $40 prestige product I use and this is comparable.
customer_reviews.author: TAD

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This primer serves no purpose. I have fine lines and big pores. Did nothing for those. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: proudmama54220

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and this primer helps me look and feel hydrated. Does not weigh my skin down and helps my makeup go on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: did nothing for me
customer_reviews.text: first it is like water. it covered nothing and did nothing for my make up. looked the same. i will go back to angel veil...it works
customer_reviews.author: bon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this going on, before putting on foundation. As with all that we put on our face, make sure you allow time ( a few minutes) to get best results, before applying your foundation
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Very good moisturizing product. Light weight on skin. Slightly blue in color but it disappears into the skin
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My face is very dry and this gives it moisturize my face well before applying make up
customer_reviews.author: lekesha williams

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my first primer. I really love it. It feels good, looks good and makes my makeup look better. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Giacobbi

customer_reviews.title: Like you put water on your face
customer_reviews.text: So refreshing and hydrating. Like you put water on your face. Smells a little like herbs but disappears quickly. It’s not cheap but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Tina K.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It smelled lemony, which was fine. It was tacky, but it didn't do well with my high end products. The ingredients made everything slide off my face. To moisturizing for me, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Hydra Touch Primer Face Makeup
product_meta.description: Enhance your complexion with our Hydra Touch Primer! This versatile formula creates a smooth, glowing canvas for flawless coverage while its skin-loving ingredients smooth and refresh the complexion.
feature_bullets: NUTRIENT-PACKED PRIMER: Moisturize and smooth your complexion with our Hydra Touch Primer! This water-based primer formula creates a smooth, glowing canvas for flawless coverage while smoothing & refreshing your skin.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: Enriched with skin-loving chamomile, ginseng, & licorice root extracts + hydrating Tremella mushroom & antioxidant boosting Centella extract, this nutritious primer formula leaves skin feeling softer with a luminous finish.

FACE FROM FOUNDATION TO FINISH: Complete your makeup look with our full line of NYX Professional Makeup face products to aid in color-correction & coverage from blush, bronzer, foundations & contouring concealer to palettes powders & setting sprays.
CRUELTY-FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is PETA certified cruelty-free. We don't test any of our products on animals.

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all of our professional makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
